name: Where Are My Friends?
description: Hardcore experimental game. All levels represent different game genres. Side by side with a cute protagonist, complete different trials to save your friends and the whole planet!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
